CustomField.formula: IF(ProductAttributeValueId__r.Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == "7368ONT","Delta"+ BR() +"The Delta UPS is recommended for 8h of emergency calls backup and supports 1 ONT" + BR() +"Flexnet"+ BR() +"The Flexnet supports up to 5 ONTs",'Delta: UPS 50W and Battery 20 Ah supports 1 ONT. Flexnet: UPS 150W supports up to 5 ONTs and Battery 7.2 Ah.')
CustomField.label: UPS(Delta and Flexnet) Guidance
